description: A brave little child reaches a dim castle with a clockwork gate that won’t open. Instead of forcing it, the child listens, finds a missing gear-key, and even calms a scared little dragon whose sparks could cause trouble. With gentle patience, the child fixes the gate and brings the castle’s warm lights back—showing that kindness and calm can solve big problems.
name: The Clockwork Gate of Kindness

pages.description: The child reaches the castle and learns the gate only opens for gentle, patient hands.
pages.story_text: {name} walked to the castle where the windows looked sleepy and dim. At the gate, {name} found a door made of gears that would not budge. {name} pushed once, then stopped. “If I rush, I might break it,” {name} whispered. {they} placed {their} hands gently on the cold metal and listened for the smallest click.

pages.description: A tiny helper-creature shows the child a lost piece that belongs to the gate.
pages.story_text: A small glow hopped near {name}’s boots and paused beside a fallen gear-key. {name} picked it up carefully, as if it were a sleeping bird. “You belong somewhere,” {name} said. The glow drifted toward the gate’s keyhole, and {name} followed, holding the tiny piece safe in {their} hands.

pages.description: A dragon appears, but it is scared; the child helps it calm down so it won’t burn the gate by accident.
pages.story_text: A little dragon peeked out, trembling. Each shaky breath made tiny sparks, and the gate creaked like it was afraid. {name} stepped back and spoke softly. “Breathe with me,” {name} said. {they} showed slow breaths—one… two… three. The dragon’s sparks faded into warm glow, and its eyes softened.

pages.description: The child places the gear-key into the gate, and the castle lights return because care is chosen over force.
pages.story_text: {name} set the gear-key into the gate’s keyhole. {they} turned it slowly—just until the gears answered. Click… whirr… clink. The gate opened a little, then more. Warm light traveled up the stone walls and woke the castle windows one by one. {name} smiled. “Gentle help can wake big places,” {name} said.

cover_text.text: Gentle help can open big doors.
